net.kuujo.vertigo.hooks

Class ModuleHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.vertigo.hooks.ModuleHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentHook, Hook<Component<?>>, Serializable

    public class ModuleHook
extends Object
    A module hook. The module hook can be used to deploy a module along side each component instance to which the hook hooks. The deployed hook module will receive notifications via the event bus. Hook module implementations should extend the abstract HookVerticle class.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
